sn22.77:4.5: And what’s not-self should be truly seen with proper understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
sn22.77:5.1: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple becomes disillusioned with form, feeling,
sn22.77:5.7: When freed, they know ‘it is freed’.
sn22.77:5.8: They understand: ‘Rebirth is ended, the spiritual life has been lived, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.’
sn22.77:5.9: As far as there are abodes of sentient beings, even up until the pinnacle of existence, the perfected ones are the foremost and the best.”
